films.title: FLAMES
films.synopsis: In the flourishing yet caste laden farmlands of Haryana, India, a mute migrant farmworker is forced to embark on a harrowing journey for survival when his 10-year-old son is accused of a murder.

films.title: INSIDE AMIR
films.synopsis: Inside Amir follows a young man on the verge of emigration who must decide whether to leave or stay. His only companion is his bicycle. The film explores his relationships, anxieties, and inner struggles in the city he is tied to.

films.title: K POPPER
films.synopsis: Teenage girl devoted to her pop idol yearns to visit Seoul while facing her mother’s opposition.

films.title: KURAK
films.synopsis: KYRGYZSTAN | SWITZERLAND | SERBIA | FRANCE | LUXEMBOURG | NETHERLANDS | ITALY

films.title: LOST LAND
films.synopsis: In the hope of reuniting with their scattered family, Shafi (4) and his sister Somira (9) leaves Rohingya refugee camp in Bangladesh and heads on a perilous journey to reach Malaysia.

films.title: NAM SAALI
films.synopsis: Gangya is asked to read his essay "On the school" aloud in class. With innocence and honesty, he speaks of broken classrooms and missing facilities, truths that expose a system built on negligence. Offended teacher beats him, forcing him to promise a rewritten, proper version. At home, hope briefly returns when his impoverished parents speak of migrating to the city for a better future. Trusting this promise, Gangya skips school the next day without rewriting the essay. But poverty decides other

films.title: REPUBLIC OF PIPOLIPINAS
films.synopsis: When the local government threatens the lady to vacate from her own land, she renounces her Filipino citizenship and builds her own micronation.

films.title: SHADOWBOX
films.synopsis: Maya lives with her husband, Sundar, and their teenage son, Debu, in a bustling suburb of Kolkata. She works multiple jobs, while Sundar is a retired soldier suffering from PTSD. Debu, often left to care for his father, is torn between embarrassment and affection. One night Maya wakes to find Sundar gone. Sundar is a suspect in a murder investigation, and a search ensues. When Sundar returns to Maya a few days later, the family balance is put to test.

films.title: SHAPE OF MOMO
films.synopsis: A woman quits her job to return to her family plagued by the deaths of male members. Finding the remaining women apathetic, she resolves to empower them towards independence and self-reliance.

films.title: THE DEEPEST SPACE IN US
films.synopsis: Kaori, an aromantic and asexual woman, is left shattered after her fiance Takerus sudden suicide. Seeking closure, she embarks on a journey with Nakano, Takerus best friend, to the place of his death unraveling hidden layers of love, identity, and the self exploration.

films.title: THE FIN
films.synopsis: In a ravaged postwar Korea, mutant Omegas serve as exploited workers. Government employee Sujin questions official doctrine while searching for Mia, a fugitive Omega.

films.title: THE LAST SUMMER
films.synopsis: Before China’s major exams, Li Zhizhi sees her father with a pregnant woman and in shock, causes an accident harming a child, forcing her to confront guilt, pressure and a deeper truth.

films.title: THE TABLET
films.synopsis: A single mother, Kayal, and her 12-year-old son, Prabhu, have a medical condition. Kayal keeps this a secret from everyone, including her son. Suspicions are raised when one of Prabhu tablets goes missing, and Kayal becomes anxious that people especially Prabhu may find out that the missing tablet is an ART tablet, which reveals that they are HIV positive

films.title: TIGER'S POND
films.synopsis: In quiet VAGHACHIPANI, a minor Shepherdess is found pregnant, Since this girl with intellectual disabilities has no idea what sex or pregnancy is, her powerful employer who wants to be the chairman of the village tries to bury the truth.  Although Prabhu begins making efforts to sweep it under the carpet by conspiring to put the blame on Dalit schoolchildren, the local do-gooder Basu is determined to expose him. Adding to Prabhu’s “woes” is his younger brother Venkati’s romantic affair with the

films.title: TWO SEASONS, TWO STRANGERS
films.synopsis: In summer, Nagisa, a woman from the city, and Natsuo, a young man visiting his relatives, meet by the sea. Their vacant gazes reflect each other as they exchange awkward words and wade into the rain drenched ocean. In winter, Li, a screenwriter in a creative slump, travels to a snow-covered village with an old camera left behind by a late acquaintance. There, she finds a peculiar, desolate guesthouse run by the enigmatic Benzo. Their conversations rarely connect, yet they set off on an unexpecte

films.title: A PREGNANT WIDOW
films.synopsis: Ambika, a young pregnant woman from a marginalized caste in Kerala, is left devastated when her husband Shibu, a village officer, dies by suicide after enduring relentless caste-based discrimination at his workplace. His struggle to secure a government job had been a rare achievement for their community, but the system denied him dignity. Left without support, Ambika applies for a job under Kerala compassionate appointment scheme. Forced to travel from Palakkad to Thiruvananthapuram, she encount

films.title: A SHORT TRIP
films.synopsis: Far from the comfort of home, Balu and Stephy struggle to hold their lives together in a foreign land. Along with demanding jobs-memotional distance, and the relentless energy of their young son Jappu, who lives with ADHD, turn everyday routines into quiet battles. Their fragile balance is further unsettled when Ameer, a desperate job seeker on the brink of collapse, enters their world by chance. What begins as an accidental meeting slowly becomes a shared space of empathy, exhaustion, and unspo

films.title: CACTUS PEARS
films.synopsis: Anand, a 30 year old city dweller is compelled to spend a 10 days in mourning for his father's death in the rugged countryside of western India. Anand tenderly bonds with a local farmer who is profusely trying to stay unmarried. As the days pass, their intimacy blooms emotionally and physically. by the end of mourning period when he has to return back to his dailyhood, will their burgeoning bond survive beyond the days that has been spent together. Sabar Bonda explores the delicate bonds that de

films.title: DESIRE
films.synopsis: Amala faces psychological challenges due to some bitter experiences in her life. Taking advantage of this, a young man named Shanu befriends her and involves her in crimes to escape the law and punishment.

films.title: GAMAN
films.synopsis: GAMAN is a Marathi feature film that explores migration and the emotional cost of leaving ones roots behind. An elderly couple from Konkan struggles to adjust to city life while staying with their sons in Mumbai. Their bond with two migrant siblings briefly fills the emotional void. As separation and loss follow, the film reflects on how future generations slowly lose their connection.

films.title: GANARAAG
films.synopsis: Ojapali is a rare art form of Assam which is used by a political party for election campaign. During the campaign, the dead body of the senior lead performer of the troupe is discovered in a paddy field. Such incident frames a negative impact upon the use of Ojapali and they could find no alternative troupe. Then some female members, going against the rules laid down by the patriarchal society forms an Ojapali troupe and start campaigning with renewed vigour. But things turn out to be completely

films.title: GONDHAL
films.synopsis: A  young bride Suman who's suffocated in her marriager, uses her lover Sarjerao's obsession in Gondhal ritual and turns sacred tradition into a deadly chess match.

films.title: HIDDEN TREMORS
films.synopsis: Set against the serene yet fragile landscape of Kanjirappally, as frequent landslides and subtle seismic shifts threaten both land and life, a quieter crisis unfolds within a family struggling to hold on to land, to memory, and to each other.

films.title: KAADU
films.synopsis: KAADU is a poignant tale of a tribal apothecary, Chaman, whose life is inseparable from the forest he inhabits. Living with his grandson Thaman, Chaman passes on ancestral wisdom, stories of coexistence, and the duty to protect nature. As climate threats and a government rehabilitation policy force villagers to leave, Chaman faces a final moral choice when a bird nests atop his relocation documents. Choosing the forest and its fragile life over displacement, Chaman walks back into the wilderness

films.title: MALAVAZHI
films.synopsis: MALAVAZHI: The Man, the Mountain, and the Vanishing Gods. Amid Kerala’s misty hills, Malavazhi follows Manikyan, the last guardian of Parayan Kali, a dying ritual of the Paraya community. Clinging to Muniyattukunnu, a mountain desecrated by quarry mafias, he resists the slow death of faith, memory, and land. Torn between devotion and despair, Manikyan’s fight for the sacred becomes a struggle against greed, displacement, and silence itself. Malavazhi is a haunting meditation on heritage and loss

films.title: OUR SCHOOL
films.synopsis: Gangya honestly reads an essay exposing his school’s broken classrooms and neglect, angering his teacher, who beats him and demands a rewritten version. Hoping his parents’ plan to migrate will change his life, Gangya skips school—but they leave silently without him. Abandoned, he returns to class and reads a safe, obedient essay, suppressing the truth. The teacher is pleased, and the system prevails.

films.title: PHOUOIBEE (THE GODDESS OF PADDY)
films.synopsis: A man running an old age home meets a mentally unstable man, later identified as Iboyaima from a remote village. On meeting his daughter and brother, he learns of their poverty and hope in sharecropping, praying to the PHOUOIBEE goddess for a better life. Their dreams shattered when unknown miscreants caused an incident that left Iboyaima mentally disabled, plunging the family into deeper hardship.

films.title: THE CREATURE
films.synopsis: JEEV is a contemporary story based on the traditions of the tribal Konkani community. When the head of the Chaure family dies on the day of Holi, an old belief is followed. Until the departed soul returns as a new Jeev on the next Holi, the family and clan stop celebrating all festivals. This new life can return as a human, animal, or bird within the clan. The story follows Miru Chaure, who with his mother, wife, and son tries to bring this new life back to his home. Will the departed soul retur

films.title: THE LOST PATH
films.synopsis: A local militant group from Northeast India assigned Longing to recruit member in a remote village. He meets School teacher who opposes their activities. The group orders longing to kill him. He loses faith and leaves them and plans to change the path but his dream never comes true.

films.title: WHITE SNOW
films.synopsis: With her yak Riri and an old cathodic TV, a mother journeys through the Kashmir Himalayan peaks to screen her sons banned film by fanatics and State, a path that breaks her body and mind but ultimately leads her to a profound, liberating freedom.

films.title: 4 BY 4
films.synopsis: 4 BY 4 is an evocative anthology film weaving together four powerful stories, each directed by a woman and brought to life by an all-women creative team. The film explores the emotional landscapes of women through narratives of love, loss, ambition, resilience, and transformation. From a mother’s quiet sacrifice that prompts reflection on identity and family, to journeys of self-discovery, betrayal, healing, and personal resolve, each story captures a distinct facet of the female experience. Wit

films.title: AGNYATHAVASI
films.synopsis: The murder after 25 years in a sleepy Malnad town brings the life of the local investigating inspector into disarray and takes him back to the murder that happened in the very town 25 years ago.

films.title: EMPTY PAGE
films.synopsis: Krishne Gowda, a former Indian soldier in his early stages of dementia, lives with his family yet remains emotionally unreachable. His wife, Swathi, struggles to hold the household together, while their only son, Sharath, is succumbed to digital isolation. A conflict ruptures the family, while having sent the boy away and missing Krishne Gowda. The story creates chilling curiosity as it reaches the culmination.

films.title: HAKKIGHAGI
films.synopsis: After losing a friend, a group of children find joy in a new companion, only for him to be forced away by adults’ misunderstanding. Refusing to give up, the children support one another and try to bring their friend back, slowly changing the mindset of those around them. The film also reflects on environmental decay, health, education, and how sensitive truth-tellers are often ignored or suppressed.

films.title: KANTARA A LEGEND CHAPTER-1
films.synopsis: During the Kadamba reign, a fictional feudal land King Vijayendra  ruler of Bangras, on his venture to kantara meets his final fate in the mystical forest. On witnessing this, his son Rajashekara seals the borders. Later Prince Kulashekara reopens by killing them. Protagonist Berme seeking prosperity, crosses the divide sparking a clash of faith, power, destiny between the Kingdom and Nature.

films.title: MIRAGE
films.synopsis: A happily living lady, whose only desire is to experience a special feeling she had felt in her childhood, is rescued from being arrested of homicide charges, only to find out that her rescuers are not who they seem to be. In order to save herself, she has to uncover the truth. This story is all about discovering her lost feeling of bliss amidst the drama that unfolds.

films.title: OUR SCHOOL
films.synopsis: Gangya honestly reads an essay exposing his school’s broken classrooms and neglect, angering his teacher, who beats him and demands a rewritten version. Hoping his parents’ plan to migrate will change his life, Gangya skips school—but they leave silently without him. Abandoned, he returns to class and reads a safe, obedient essay, suppressing the truth. The teacher is pleased, and the system prevails.

films.title: RAVANA RAJYADALLI NAVADAMPATHIGALU
films.synopsis: RAVANA RAJYADALLI NAVADAMPATHIGALU is a Social Satirical drama set in the urban back drop of Bengaluru, in areas where middle class population is high. The story is about a newly married couple getting stuck into the clutches of the social system they live in and how are they going to fight it.

films.title: RUBY CUBE
films.synopsis: "RUBY CUBE is an intimate family drama set during a brief hill-station vacation where three generations reunite. Psychologist Rohini and her ex-husband Moorthy are brought together by their daughter Chitra, who faces her own marital struggles. As they share space, unresolved tensions and quiet affections surface, revealing the fragility of relationships. The Rubik’s Cube becomes a metaphor for life—complex, imperfect, and requiring patience rather than control."

films.title: SRI JAGANNATHA DAASARU PART 2
films.synopsis: In the 17th century, Sri Srinivasacharya, a man of great learning, experiences severe stomach ache as he spreads false propaganda about Vijayadasa due to the pride of his scholarship. He was later saved from death by the grace of Gopaladasa and Vijayadasa. Following their instructions, he goes to Pandarpur, where, by divine blessing, he receives the Pen name "Jagannathavitthala" and continues his practice of Dasa Sankirtana.

films.title: TO MY SACRED FATHER
films.synopsis: A popular travel vlogger, Prithvi, uncovers a dark secret about his own family. His search for the truth leads him to his estranged father, setting him on a journey of self-discovery. Does Prithvi find closure? Does his journey meet destiny?

films.title: VANYA
films.synopsis: Deep in a forest, Kariyappa, an old man, lives in harmony with the wilderness that has been his home for decades. His days are quiet with the jungle. He is a man forgotten by time. But when a project threatens to cut through the forest for legal reasons, officials arrive to convince or force Kariyappa to leave. What begins as a procedural eviction spiral into a complex psychological and moral conflict. The forest, almost a character itself, becomes a battleground between modernity and memory. Th

films.title: X & Y
films.synopsis: An eager unborn soul, desperate to experience life, pleads with the Creator to send him to Earth. Tasked with a unique mission, he must find his future parents and ensure their union, only then can he be born. But once on Earth, the soul is met with harsh realities, unexpected struggles, and emotional turmoil. The vibrant world he once longed for turns out to be far more difficult than imagined. Disillusioned and weary, the soul begins to regret his decision, yearning to return to the Creator an

films.title: AMOEBA
films.synopsis: SINGAPORE | THE NETHERLANDS | FRANCE | SPAIN | SOUTH KOREA

films.title: FORASTERA
films.synopsis: During a sunlit summer in Mallorca, a family struggles with the loss of its matriarch. As grief settles into everyday life, teenage Cata begins to quietly assume her grandmother’s place within the household. Through small gestures and unspoken moments, she absorbs inherited memories and responsibilities. The film unfolds as a gentle, intimate debut that explores mourning, family bonds, and the subtle ways absence reshapes identity, revealing how echoes of those we lose continue to live on in une

films.title: LITTLE TROUBLE GIRLS
films.synopsis: Introverted Lucia joins her Catholic school’s all-girls choir, where she befriends a popular older student. But the choir’s weekend trip to a countryside convent tests this friendship and Lucia’s beliefs. As the strict rules of the environment close in, her body begins to awaken.

films.title: OUT OF LOVE
films.synopsis: After several years, Suzanne unexpectedly shows up at her sister Jeanne's house in a little French town with her two kids. At first glance, it appears like Suzanne is hesitantly trying to get back in touch with her sister. But the morning light shatters this illusion.

films.title: SILENT FRIEND
films.synopsis: In a botanical garden in a medieval German university town stands a majestic ginkgo tree, silent witness to more than a century of change. In 2020, a neuroscientist from Hong Kong studying babies’ minds begins an unexpected experiment with the tree. In 1972, a student is transformed by observing a single geranium. In 1908, the university’s first female student photographs humble plants, revealing hidden cosmic patterns. Each, awkwardly rooted in their own present, reaches out to nature and is qu

films.title: SUNDAYS
films.synopsis: Ainara, a brilliant and idealistic young woman, faces a pivotal decision about her future. While her family expects her to choose a university and pursue a conventional career, Ainara feels uncertain. As her friends dive into the freedoms and emotions of adolescence, love, parties, self-discovery, she finds herself drawn elsewhere. A quiet spark within her pulls toward the contemplative life of a convent. This unexpected calling challenges everything her family envisions for her, threatening to

films.title: THE PRESIDENT'S CAKE
films.synopsis: While people across 1990s Iraq struggle to survive the war and food shortages, Saddam Hussein requires each school in the country to prepare a cake to celebrate his birthday. Despite her efforts to avoid getting picked, 9-year-old Lamia is chosen among her classmates. The young girl must now use her wits and imagination to gather ingredients for the mandatory cake or face the consequences.

films.title: TO THE WEST, IN ZAPATA
films.synopsis: Landi and Mercedes are a married couple living in the harsh marshlands of Zapata, one of Cuba’s most unforgiving regions. As the pandemic deepens, with shortages and social unrest, daily survival becomes a test of endurance. Driven by love for their son, they are pushed to extreme choices to secure his future.

films.title: A LIGHT THAT NEVER GOES OUT
films.synopsis: After a breakdown, Pauli, a classically trained flute player, returns to his small Finnish hometown to recover at his parents’ house. Unable to play, he wrestles with failure and silence. He reconnects with Iiris, an old classmate who creates experimental music alone. Drawn to her unruly energy, Pauli begins making music again through strange, imperfect collaborations. As past pressures return, he must choose between control and freedom, and decide what kind of artist and person he wants to beco

films.title: A POET
films.synopsis: Oscar Restrepo’s obsession with poetry brought him no glory. Aging and erratic, he has succumbed to the cliché of the poet in the shadows. Meeting Yurlady, a teenage girl from humble roots, and helping her cultivate her talent brings some light to his days, but dragging her into the world of poets may not be the way.

films.title: A SAD AND BEAUTIFUL WORLD
films.synopsis: LEBANON | UNITED STATES | GERMANY | SAUDI ARABIA | QATAR

films.title: A USEFUL GHOST
films.synopsis: March is mourning his wife Nat who has recently passed away due to dust pollution. He discovers her spirit has returned by possessing a vacuum cleaner. Disturbed by a ghost that appeared after a worker's death shut down their factory, his family reject their unconventional human-ghost relationship. Trying to convince them of their love, Nat offers to cleanse the factory. To become a useful ghost, she must first get rid of the useless ones.

films.title: AMRUM
films.synopsis: Spring 1945, Amrum Island. In order to assist his mother provide for the family during the last days of the war, 12-year-old Nanning works the local farm, goes fishing at night, and braves the risky sea to hunt seals. Life on the stunning, windswept island feels almost like heaven despite the challenges. However, a greater threat is revealed when peace eventually arrives, the adversary is much closer than he had anticipated.

films.title: AS WE BREATHE
films.synopsis: In the early 2000s, in a small Anatolian town, ten-year-old Esma watches her world slowly fall apart after a factory explosion triggers a fire that never seems to end. As smoke spreads across the land and her family struggles to get by, daily life becomes uncertain and fragile. Caught between fear and innocence, Esma clings to her childhood, finding quiet strength in small moments. AS WE BREATHE is a sensitive coming-of-age story about growing up amid unseen catastrophe, resilience, and the stub

films.title: BEACHCOMBER
films.synopsis: Elias dreams of building a boat from scrap metal, chasing the shadow of his sailor father's legacy. But as his creation crumbles, so does the myth he's built around himself, forcing him to confront the fragile truth of who he really is.

films.title: BEFORE THE BODY
films.synopsis: Ana and her two kids live in the anonimity of the suburbs. She cares for sick people to earn a living; but her little daughter requires a lot more, so much so that it puts their delicate life at risk.

films.title: BELÉN
films.synopsis: Belén is inspired by a true case that ignited an international movement. In conservative Argentina, Julieta is falsely accused of infanticide, until lawyer Soledad Deza bravely challenges a corrupt, classist, patriarchal justice system. Her fight sparks nationwide outrage and solidarity, transforming a personal tragedy into a powerful struggle for women’s rights, based on Somos Belén by Ana Correa.

films.title: BETTER GO MAD IN THE WILD
films.synopsis: Franta and Ondra are inseparable twins, living away from civilization in the deep bosom of nature. Their daily routine, permeated with peace and harmony with the surrounding world, begins to crack under the pressure of internal contradictions. Franta longs for freedom, change and adventure, while Ondra clings to the safety of immutability. However, their dual existence breaks like a mirror, the same appearance, different desires. In the silent embrace of nature, a fragile drama of separation, re

films.title: BLUE HERON
films.synopsis: A family of six moves to Vancouver Island in the late 1990s, and Sasha, the youngest kid, gradually reveals underlying dynamics. The family's eldest child, Jeremy, interferes with their new beginning with his increasingly risky behavior.

films.title: BROKEN VOICES
films.synopsis: In early 1990’s Czech Republic, 13-year-old Karolína earns a place in a worldfamous girls’ choir, joining her older sister and other driven young talents. Her voice soon catches the attention of the admired and enigmatic choirmaster Macha. Being singled out feels like a triumph, until she begins to understand the unsettling price of that privilege. Inspired by the Bambini di Praga case, the film explores the fragile line where innocence collides with abusive power.

films.title: CARAVAN
films.synopsis: Ester, 45, has built her entire life around caring for her son David, who has Down syndrome and autism. Their bond is deep, but years of responsibility have left her drained. While visiting friends in Italy, David’s behavior creates tension, and they are asked to sleep in a caravan. That night, Ester drives away. As they travel through southern Italy in the old camper, Ester begins to imagine a different life. Meanwhile, David slowly opens up to the world and to Zuza, a free-spirited drifter who

films.title: CASE 137
films.synopsis: Stéphanie, a police officer working for Internal Affairs, is assigned to a case involving a young man severely wounded during a tense and chaotic demonstration in Paris. While she finds no evidence of illegitimate police violence, the case takes a personal turn when she discovers the victim is from her hometown.

films.title: CATANE
films.synopsis: In a remote Romanian village, an unusually high number of residents receive disability aid, leading social services to send inspectors to investigate. The village seems almost like a storybook place, where each person has a different disability but continues daily life with determination and humor. Moved by what they see, the inspectors help secure more financial support for the community. However, when they return to collect missing documents, they discover that the village is not as simple or

films.title: CHRISTY
films.synopsis: Christy, seventeen, is forced to move in with his estranged older half-brother after being thrown out of his suburban foster home. While his brother sees the arrangement as temporary, Christy begins to feel at home on Cork's working-class Northside, making friends and reconnecting with his past through his seemingly more corrupting extended family. Determined to give Christy a better future, his brother faces tough choices that could drive a wedge between them. After so many years apart, the bro

films.title: CLOISTERED SISTER
films.synopsis: The film follows Stela, a 36 year old educated woman unable to find stability in work or life. Since childhood she has idolized a famous Serbian musician, a Balkan superstar. Vera, a minor celebrity, promises to help Stela meet him and brings her from rural poverty to Bucharest, where she runs a small business. Set between Romania’s EU boom and the financial crisis, their plans collapse when Vera’s company fails. Working as a servant in Vera’s home, Stela finally meets her idol, only to discover

films.title: COMANDANTE FRITZ
films.language: Kannada | kannada | German | Spanish | German | Portuguese
films.synopsis: In 1972, young East German officer Fritz arrives in Cuba during the ceremonial transfer of Isla Ernesto Thälmann, a symbolic gift from Fidel Castro to the GDR. Tasked with preventing a CIA assassination attempt, Fritz quickly finds himself disoriented by the unfamiliar rhythm of the island and the limits of his training. When he meets the enigmatic Lola, his rigid sense of duty begins to soften. As politics, desire, and confusion intertwine, Fritz confronts the fragile line between ideology and

films.title: DE TAL PALO
films.synopsis: De Tal Palo follows Don Manuel, a retired grandfather whose quiet life is upended when he gains legal custody of his nine-year-old granddaughter, Irene, after her mother is violently assaulted by her husband. Thrown into an unexpected role, Manuel struggles to adapt, yet gradually forms a tender and resilient bond with Irene. As they learn to become a family, he also begins to show the early signs of a troubling health condition, adding urgency and emotional depth to their journey.

films.title: DEAD DOG
films.synopsis: On a rainy night, Aida retreats to a secluded family house in the Lebanese mountains, seeking distance and clarity. Her quiet solitude is disrupted by the sudden arrival of her husband Walid, who has been living abroad for years and did not expect to find her there. Over the next four days, the couple is forced into an intimate reunion marked by silence, tension, and unresolved questions. As they cautiously circle each other, memories and resentments surface, revealing a marriage suspended betwe

films.title: DIVINE COMEDY
films.synopsis: Bahram is a 40-year-old filmmaker who’s spent his entire career making films in Turkish-Azeri, none of which have ever been screened in Iran. His latest work, once again denied permission by the Ministry of culture, pushes him to the edge of defiance. With his sharp-tongued, Vespa-riding producer Sadaf by his side, he embarks on an underground mission to showcase his film to an Iranian audience, dodging government censors, absurd bureaucracy, and his own self-doubts.

films.title: DJ AHMET
films.synopsis: NORTH MACEDONIA | CZECH REPUBLIC | SERBIA | CROATIA

films.title: DRAGONFLY
films.synopsis: DRAGONFLY tells the story of an unlikely bond between two neighbours. Colleen, adrift and searching for purpose, becomes increasingly concerned by the neglect faced by her elderly neighbour, Elsie. Frustrated by the indifference of professionals meant to care for her, Colleen steps in, offering companionship, attention, and a sense of dignity that Elsie has been denied. What begins as an act of kindness slowly deepens into dependency, raising questions about control, intention, and responsibilit

films.title: DREAMS
films.synopsis: Johanne falls in love for the first time, with her teacher. To preserve her feelings, she documents her emotions and experiences in writing. When her mother and grandmother read what she has written, they are initially shocked by its intimate content but soon see that it has literary potential. As they debate whether to publish it, Johanne navigates the gap between her romantic fantasy and reality, and all three women confront their differing views on love, sexuality, and self-discovery.

films.title: DRY LEAF
films.synopsis: Sports photographer Lisa disappears without explanation, leaving a letter asking not to be searched for. Her last traces lead to remote Georgian villages where she was photographing rural football fields. Her father Irakli refuses to accept the silence she leaves behind and begins a journey to find her. Joined by Levani, Lisa’s enigmatic closest friend, he travels across the countryside, passing through quiet villages and meeting strangers and children playing football. They uncover only fleetin

films.title: FATHER
films.synopsis: A tragic mistake shatters the life of a devoted father, shaking his marriage and isolating him in guilt. As the threat of prison looms, he begins to question whether he deserves to go on living. But when he and his wife come to see that the tragedy was not a personal failure, but something rooted deep in the architecture of the human mind, a fragile path toward forgiveness begins to emerge. Even with this understanding, the question remains: can love survive what no heart was built to endure?

films.title: FATHER MOTHER SISTER BROTHER
films.synopsis: FATHER MOTHER SISTER BROTHER is a feature film, though carefully constructed in the form of a triptych. All three stories concern the relationships between adult children, their somewhat distant parent (or parents), and each other. Each of the three chapters takes place in the present, and each in a different country. FATHER is set in the Northeast US, MOTHER in Dublin, Ireland, and SISTER BROTHER in Paris, France. The film is a series of character studies, quiet, observational and non-judgmenta

films.title: FIUME O MORTE!
films.synopsis: Under the command of the colorful, war-loving Italian author Gabriele D'Annunzio, a group of about three hundred men stormed the Northern Adriatic port town of Fiume, which is now Rijeka (Croatia), on September 12, 1919, with the intention of annexing the city to Italy. His official photography crew took almost 10,000 pictures during what is considered one of the most strange militant sieges in history over the course of the following 16 months.

films.title: FOLLIES
films.synopsis: This film traces a couple’s first steps into polyamory. After sixteen years together and raising two children, they decide to open their relationship. Over several months, we follow their experiments with different forms of non-monogamy, told across six chapters. As new relationships emerge, their long-standing bond begins to shift, exposing tensions, desires, and doubts. The film observes how love changes under pressure, and whether what they have built can survive this transformation.

films.title: GOD WILL NOT HELP
films.synopsis: CROATIA | ITALY | ROMANIA | GREECE| FRANCE | SLOVENIA

films.title: HALF MOON
films.synopsis: The eruption of war in Syria made it impossible for Syrian composer/clarinettist Kinan Azmeh to return, sparking his introspective journey into the power of art during times of conflict. He delves into his roots, personal stories, reshaping the narrative of contemporary Syria through music.

films.title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY
films.synopsis: Toha is a young maid who dreams of one simple thing: a birthday candle to make a wish. When her best friend, Nelly, the daughter of her employer, is promised a birthday party amid her parents’ looming divorce, Toha takes it upon herself to make the celebration happen. As she plans the party, she forms an unexpected bond with Nelly’s mother Laila, briefly blurring rigid social boundaries. When the family tries to send Toha away to prevent her attendance, her persistence exposes buried tensions. C

films.title: HUMAN RESOURCE
films.synopsis: Fren works in HR at an unjust company, interviewing young new hires and closely observing their lives. While doing so, she secretly grapples with her one month pregnancy and the question of whether to bring a child into the world.

films.title: I ONLY REST IN THE STORM
films.synopsis: Sérgio travels to a metropolis in Guinea-Bissau to work for an NGO as an environmental engineer on a road project between the desert and the forest. There, he becomes entangled in an intimate yet unbalanced relationship with two inhabitants of the city, Diara and Gui. As the neo-colonial dynamics among the expatriate community unravel, this fragile bond becomes his only refuge from an impending collapse into solitude or barbarism.

films.title: IMPATIENCE OF THE HEART
films.synopsis: On a night out, a young soldier tries to improve his chances with an attractive older woman by courting her grumpy sister. But when Isaac (23) playfully pulls Edith (22) off a bench, she slumps limply to the floor. Only now does he discover her wheelchair parked on the side. Isaac tries to clear up the misunderstanding, but a scuffle ensues with some of the regulars and his comrades. Burdened with shame, Isaac is urged to correct the sisters’ image of him. He makes an effort to connect with Edit

films.title: IT WAS JUST AN ACCIDENT
films.synopsis: When an auto mechanic encounters the man who may have been his torturer in prison, he kidnaps him to exact vengeance. But since the sole clue to Eghbal’s identity is the squeak of his prosthetic leg, Vahid turns to other now-freed victims for confirmation. And the danger only escalates.

films.title: JANINE MOVES TO THE COUNTRY
films.synopsis: In a small-town microcosm of Germany caught between violence and erotic fantasy. Janine, who is queer, moves back to the country and encounters ghosts of her past. A peeping neighbor’s inappropriate conduct stirs up dark memories – and also draws her in.

films.title: KIKA
films.synopsis: Kika (Manon Clavel) is a married social worker whose stable life is upended when she falls in love with another man and becomes pregnant – and again when her new partner unexpectedly dies. This sets the scene for her journey in search of a new independence, as she navigates impermanence, grief, and economic precarity, and seeks out a more lucrative and dependable means of supporting herself and her child.

films.title: KOKORAS
films.synopsis: A janitor of the Municipality of Athens, determined to give his six-year-old son the future he himself was denied, enrolls him in a private school. But his chase of the “Greek dream” turns into a tragicomic spiral of conflicts, leading to a bitter revelation: perhaps his illusions were all he truly had.

films.title: KONTINENTAL '25
films.synopsis: Orsolya is a bailiff in Cluj, the main city in Transylvania. One day she must evict a homeless man who lives in the basement of a building. An unexpected event creates a moral crisis she tries to solve as best she can.

films.title: LATE SHIFT
films.synopsis: Nurse Floria brings passion and precision to her surgical ward in a Swiss hospital, always attuned to patients amid chaos. On a grueling late shift with a colleague absent and the understaffed unit- she juggles a critically ill young mother, a diagnosis-anxious elder, and a demanding private patient. As night deepens, her routine spirals into a desperate race against time.

films.title: LOVE ME TENDER
films.synopsis: At the end of summer, Clémence tells her ex-husband that she’s had relationships with women. Her life is turned upside down when he files to strip her of their son’s custody. Then begins a struggle of several years for Clémence to defend her right to be a mother and a woman, free to make her own choices.

films.title: MAGELLAN
films.language: Kannada | kannada | Portuguese | Spanish | Tagalog | French | Portuguese | Spanish
films.synopsis: 16th century. Magellan, a young and ambitious Portuguese navigator, rebels against the power of the King, who doesn’t support his dream of discovering the world. He persuades the Spanish Crown to fund his bold expedition to the fabled lands of the East. The voyage is exhausting beyond expectations, with hunger and mutiny pushing the crew to their limits. Upon reaching the islands of the Malayan Archipelago, Magellan’s mind changes. He becomes obsessed with conquest and conversion, which sparks v

films.title: MAYSOON
films.language: Kannada | kannada | German | Arabic | German | Portuguese
films.synopsis: Almost ten years after the Arab Spring, the young Egyptian archaeologist Maysoon lives in Berlin with her German boyfriend Tobi and their two children. When private problems begin to shake her life, and her political and social status are threatened, Maysoon fears that she may lose everything once again: family, love, and freedom. Fuelled by love and idealism, she fights for her independence as a woman and as a citizen on a rollercoaster that can at any time turn everything into ruins.

films.title: MILITANTROPOS
films.synopsis: Militantropos captures the human condition through the fractured realities of the Russian invasion of Ukraine. The film pieces together everyday lives transformed by war—those who flee, those who lose everything, and those who stay to resist. Amid devastation and atrocity, it traces the instinct to survive and the deep-seated need for closeness. It is a profound exploration of how the human is absorbed into war, and how war, in turn, becomes an inseparable part of the human soul.

films.title: MORTICIAN
films.synopsis: An Iranian mortician in Canada, tasked by the Iranian government to wash the bodies of recently deceased ex-pats, has his world turned upside down when he receives an unusual request from a dissident singer in hiding.

films.title: MOTHERTONGUE
films.synopsis: A struggling actress returns to her hometown in Sichuan. Confused by the fact that she can no longer speak her native dialect, she searches for a new life.

films.title: MY FATHER'S SHADOW
films.synopsis: A semi-autobiographical tale set over the course of a single day in the Nigerian metropolis, Lagos, during the 1993 Nigerian election crisis. The story follows a father, estranged from his two young sons, as they travel through the massive city while political unrest threatens their journey home.

films.title: MY UNCLE JENS
films.synopsis: Akam, a young literature teacher living a quiet life in Oslo, is caught off guard when his estranged uncle from Iranian Kurdistan arrives unannounced. Though his shared apartment is already crowded, Akam feels compelled to offer him a place to stay. Days pass, and the visit stretches on, unsettling both Akam and his flatmates. As tensions rise, Akam begins to question his uncle’s true reasons for coming. What starts as an awkward family obligation soon unfolds into a chain of revelations, forcin

films.title: NINO
films.synopsis: In three days, Nino will face a major challenge. But first, his doctors have assigned him two vital tasks. Two missions that will lead the young man on a journey through Paris, compelling him to reconnect with the world and himself.

films.title: NO OTHER CHOICE
films.synopsis: Adapted from a novel by Donald E. Westlake, this darkly comic satire by Park Chan-wook follows Lee Man-soo, a longtime paper-company employee suddenly laid off after twenty-five years. Once comfortable with a family, home, and status, he finds himself drowning in debt and pressure to sell his childhood house. Obsessed with landing a prestigious job at a rival firm, he invents a fake company and invites competing candidates to private meetings, where he quietly eliminates them. The film turns wor

films.title: NOMAD SHADOW
films.language: Kannada | kannada | Arabic | Spanish | Japanese | Portuguese
films.synopsis: Mariam, violently deported from Spain back to the family home in Western Sahara she left a decade earlier, rails against the confines of a culture and home she had once escaped. Mariam’s relentless determination to steer her own destiny in the world of complex traditions she returns to puts her at risk of losing everything, including the people who care for her most.

films.title: ORENDA
films.synopsis: On a remote lighthouse island, two women are forced to confront a shared past. Nora, a renowned opera singer, arrives to bury her husband, who has taken his own life and wished to be laid to rest there. She encounters Natalia, a former priest living in isolation, who is unsettled by Nora’s presence. Bound by their connection to the same man, the two women struggle to find words for grief, guilt, and unspoken truths. Together they face questions of love, faith, and forgiveness.

films.title: OSLO: A TAIL OF PROMISE
films.language: Kannada | kannada | Hindi | English | Marathi | Portuguese
films.synopsis: OSLO: A TAIL OF PROMISE is a true, non-linear journey of Pooja and Oslo, a Siberian husky who transforms her life. From founding an ecological sanctuary called The Farm to healing through animals, the film weaves love, loss, courage, and surrender. Oslo, a traumatised pup, becomes Pooja’s anchor and guide, opening her to the sentience of nature and animal wisdom. Their annual 5,000 km pilgrimage to the snow raises ethical questions, confronts grief, and celebrates the profound human–animal bond,

films.title: OUTCRY
films.synopsis: Seti loves music and dreams of being heard. In Iran, where women are legally banned from performing in public, she turns the street into her stage and begins to sing. Passersby become her audience, and her defiant act quickly draws attention. Seti’s voice spreads, turning her into a symbol for a generation unwilling to accept silence or repression. Produced independently, Soheil Beiraghi’s fourth feature offers a rare, uncompromising look at contemporary Iran. The film stands as an act of resist

films.title: PROMISED SKY
films.language: Kannada | kannada | French | Arabic | French | Portuguese
films.synopsis: Marie, an Ivorian pastor and former journalist, has lived in Tunisia for ten years. Her home becomes a refuge for Naney, a young mother seeking a better future, and Jolie, a strong-willed student carrying her family’s hopes. The arrival of a little orphan girl challenges their sense of solidarity in a tense social climate, revealing both their fragility and strength.

films.title: REEDLAND
films.synopsis: When reed cutter Johan discovers the lifeless body of a girl on his land, he is overcome by an ambiguous sense of guilt. While taking care of his granddaughter, he sets out on a quest to track down evil. But darkness can thrive in unexpected places.

films.title: RENOVATION
films.synopsis: The current Lithuania's Vilnius. Perfectionist 29-year-old Ilona feels pressure to be successful and settled by the time she is 30. She starts to wonder how she really wants to live at this pivotal moment in her life. She and her lover Matas move into what looks to be the ideal apartment, and things are starting to become serious. However, when the building's renovations get underway, Ilona's inner doubts gradually come to light. She unexpectedly becomes acquainted with Oleg, a construction work

films.title: RESURRECTION
films.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic future, a woman emerges from brain surgery and finds herself in a semi-conscious state, the world around her laid to waste. She comes upon the motionless body of an android and decides to tell it the history of China. Slowly, with each passing night, the robot’s senses are restored. When her stories arrive at the present, she faces a dilemma: should she return to the real world, or should she follow her heart and remain with this machine?

films.title: RIVERSTONE
films.synopsis: Against the backdrop of alleged custodial killings disguised as police encounters, the film probes the moral and psychological cost of state-sanctioned violence. As three police officers escort a suspect to a remote location for a staged “shootout,” they confront their own doubts, fears, and complicity. Caught between duty, ambition, and conscience, their journey exposes how political power manipulates law enforcement, erodes due process, and turns ordinary officers into instruments of arbitrary

films.title: SENTIMENTAL VALUE
films.synopsis: Sisters Nora and Agnes reunite with their estranged father, the charismatic Gustav, a once renowned director who offers stage actress Nora a role in what he hopes will be his comeback film. When Nora turns it down, she soon discovers he’s given her part to an eager young Hollywood star. Suddenly, the two sisters must navigate their complicated relationship with their father and deal with an American star dropped right into the middle of their complex family dynamics.

films.title: SIRĀT
films.language: Kannada | kannada | Spanish | French | Arabic | English | Portuguese
films.synopsis: A man and his son arrive at a rave lost in the mountains of Morocco. They are looking for Marina, their daughter and sister, who disappeared months ago at another rave. Driven by fate, they decide to follow a group of ravers in search of one last party, in the hope that Marina will be there.

films.title: SKIN OF YOUTH
films.synopsis: SKIN OF YOUTH focuses on the turbulent romance between a transgender sex worker seeking to realise her dream of living in a woman’s body, and a cage fighter in 1990s Saigon. San wants to have enough money for a sex-change operation that will fulfill her dream of living in a woman’s body. San’s lover, Nam, must work as an underground dog-cage fighter to support this dream. The young lovers are unaware that the dark forces they will have to battle may cost them their relationship and test the limi

films.title: SLEEPLESS CITY
films.synopsis: Toni, a 15-year-old Roma boy, lives in the largest illegal settlement in Europe, on the outskirts of Madrid. Proud to belong to his family of scrap metal dealers, he follows his grandfather everywhere. But as demolitions move closer and closer to their plot, and his grandfather is willing to do anything to stay, Toni will have to choose what to let go and what to sacrifice. This is the premise of the film SLEEPLESS CITY.

films.title: SOUND OF FALLING
films.synopsis: Four girls, Alma, Erika, Angelika, and Lenka, each spend their youth on the same farm in northern Germany. As the home evolves over a century, echoes of the past linger in its walls. Though separated by time, their lives begin to mirror each other.

films.title: STRAIGHT CIRCLE
films.synopsis: A pair of enemy soldiers stationed on a remote border in a vast featureless desert descend into a state of profound disorientation after forgetting which side of the border is which. As they grapple with their identities, loyalties, and the absurdity of their situation, their isolation slowly gives way to an unfathomable nightmare that will blur the line between friend and foe.

films.title: TALES OF THE WOUNDED LAND
films.synopsis: As war engulfs South Lebanon, a family flees their home while bombs reduce their town to ruins. Returning to devastation, they find only fragments of what once was, yet among the wreckage, the community clings to a fragile hope that peace and renewal will come.

films.title: TÊTES BRÛLÉES
films.synopsis: Twelve-year-old Eya grows up in a Tunisian Muslim family in Brussels, closely bonded to her older brother Younès and his circle of friends, who treat her as one of their own. When Younès dies suddenly, her world is shaken. As her community gathers around the family, Eya experiences both shared solidarity and private silence in grief. Through creativity, faith, and her evolving connection with her brother’s friends, she slowly finds her own way forward.

films.title: THE BLUE TRAIL
films.synopsis: A 75-year-old woman takes a canoe across the Amazon to pursue her passion of flying, eluding monitoring and forced retirement. A gentle, rebellious voyage of self-discovery, disobedience, and resistance.

films.title: THE DEVIL SMOKES
films.synopsis: The fears of five stoic young siblings abandoned by their parents mix with those of their schizophrenic grandmother, who now looks after them, blurring and gradually dissolving the boundary between reality and imagination.

films.title: THE DISAPPEARANCE OF JOSEF MENGELE
films.language: Kannada | kannada | German | Portuguese | Spanish | German
films.synopsis: After World War II, Nazi doctor Josef Mengele, known as the “Angel of Death,” escaped to South America and vanished into a shadowy life across Argentina, Brazil, and Paraguay. Based on Olivier Guez’s novel, Kirill Serebrennikov’s film follows Mengele’s years in hiding, marked by fear, isolation, and the inescapable weight of his crimes. Watched through the uneasy gaze of his son and haunted by memories of the past, the film examines how a war criminal survives, unpunished yet never free, offerin

films.title: THE DREAMED ONES
films.synopsis: It’s not uncommon for a film to have a moving love story at its core. Yet this particular set-up is unusual. The lovers here are Ingeborg Bachmann and Paul Celan, both important representatives of post-war German-language poetry. The story of the relationship between the Austrian and the Jew from Czernowitz is told through their nearly 20-year correspondence (1948–1967). Or, more precisely, by a young woman and a young man reading from their letters in a studio in Vienna’s venerable Funkhaus.

films.title: THE LAST AMBASSADOR
films.language: Kannada | kannada | English | Russian | Spanish | Portuguese
films.synopsis: Afghanistan‘s last female ambassador, Manizha Bakhtari, is risking everything in her fight for the rights of girls and women in Afghanistan.

films.title: THE LOVE THAT REMAINS
films.synopsis: The film tenderly captures a year in the life of a family as the parents navigate their separation. Through both playful and heartfelt moments, the film portrays the bittersweet essence of faded love and shared memories amidst the changing seasons.

films.title: THE MASTERMIND
films.synopsis: JB Mooney, an unemployed carpenter turned amateur art thief, organizes his first major robbery in a quiet part of Massachusetts about 1970.  His life falls apart when things go wrong.

films.title: THE MYSTERIOUS GAZE OF THE FLAMINGO
films.synopsis: 1982. As an unknown disease begins to spread in a small mining town in the Chilean desert, gay men are accused of transmitting it through their eyes. Twelve-year-old Lidia, the only girl in the community, sets out in search of the truth.

films.title: THE PORTUGUESE HOUSE
films.language: Kannada | kannada | Portuguese | Spanish | Portuguese | Spanish
films.synopsis: The disappearance of his wife leaves Fernando, a quiet geography teacher, completely devastated. Aimless, he assumes another man’s identity as a gardener on a Portuguese estate, where he forms an unexpected friendship with the owner, stepping into a new life that isn’t his own.

films.title: THE PUPIL
films.synopsis: As the line between mentorship and manipulation blurs, 12 year old Daan faces a frightening inner conflict. He admires his football coach Ries, who slowly becomes a central figure in his life and begins to exploit that trust. What feels like attention and encouragement gradually turns into control and abuse. Daan’s behaviour changes as he withdraws from his family, skips school, and becomes increasingly volatile. Caught between shame, loyalty, and confusion, he struggles to understand what is ha

films.title: THE THINGS YOU KILL
films.synopsis: Haunted by the suspicious death of his ailing mother, Ali, a university professor coerces his enigmatic gardener to execute a cold-blooded act of vengeance.

films.title: TO THE VICTORY!
films.synopsis: Ukraine, in the near future, after the war has ended. A film director remains behind in a country struggling to redefine itself. Unemployed and emotionally adrift, he is cut off from both his profession and his family, who have rebuilt their lives in Vienna. Caught between denial and inertia, he drifts through a fragile peace, clinging to the belief that stability will return on its own. As time stretches on, hope becomes increasingly abstract, exposing a quiet portrait of displacement, masculin

films.title: TWO PROSECUTORS
films.language: Kannada | kannada | German | Russian | English | Japanese | Portuguese
films.synopsis: Soviet Union, 1937. Thousands of letters from detainees falsely accused by the regime are burned in a prison cell. Against all odds, one of them reaches its destination, upon the desk of the newly appointed local prosecutor, Alexander Kornyev. Kornyev does his utmost to meet the prisoner, a victim of agents of the secret police, the NKVD. A dedicated Bolshevik of integrity, the young prosecutor suspects foul play. His quest for justice will take him all the way to the office of the Attorney Gene

films.title: VANILLA
films.synopsis: In late 1980s Mexico, eight-year-old Roberta watches her family of seven women fight to save their home from mounting debt, a struggle that reshapes how she sees herself and those around her.

films.title: WE BELIEVE YOU
films.synopsis: Today, Alice stands before a judge and there’s no room for error. She must speak up for her children, as custody is being called into question. Can she protect them from their father before it’s too late?

films.title: WHAT DOES THAT NATURE SAY TO YOU
films.synopsis: A young poet drives his girlfriend to her parents’ imposing home and is unexpectedly drawn into their world. After meeting her father, mother, and sister, a casual visit stretches into a full day of shared meals, drinks, and wandering conversations. As time drifts on, small gestures and offhand remarks reveal unspoken tensions, desires, and misunderstandings, turning an ordinary encounter into a quietly revealing study of relationships, intimacy, and chance.

films.title: WHERE THE WIND COMES FROM
films.synopsis: On the outskirts of Tunis, lifelong friends Alyssa, fierce and impulsive, and Mehdi, a gentle aspiring artist, feel trapped by limited prospects. When Alyssa discovers a national art competition in Djerba that could change everything, she drags Mehdi onto an unplanned road trip across Tunisia. As they cross cities, deserts, and coastlines, the journey becomes a test of class, courage, and loyalty. Dreams collide with reality, resentments surface, and their friendship is stretched to breaking poi

films.title: WIND, TALK TO ME
films.synopsis: Stefan reunites with his family to celebrate his grandmother’s birthday for the first time after his mother’s recent passing. This homecoming, driven by his urge to complete a film about his mother and an attempt to make amends by rescuing a stray dog, will ignite an introspective journey for Stefan. Inspired by the director’s real-life experiences and starring his actual family members in a mission to complete a lake house and a film, WIND, TALK TO ME is an intimate cinematic exploration of the

films.title: YOUNG MOTHERS
films.synopsis: 1997. Eight-year-old Linda drifts from her wealthy grandmother’s Swiss villa with her carefree mother, Eva. In Italy, they meet sisters Azzurra and Marta. A chance summer encounter binds the three girls in a gang to protect each other, their youth, and freedom. Around them swirl selfish parents chasing fragile dreams, gossiping neighbors, and a queer babysitter searching for belonging in a homophobic world.

films.synopsis: On the evening of March 31, 1943, legendary lyricist Lorenz Hart confronts his shattered self-confidence in Sardi’s bar as his former collaborator Richard Rodgers celebrates the opening night of his ground-breaking hit musical “Oklahoma!”

films.title: FAMILY PATTABIC
films.synopsis: FAMILY PATTABIC is a documentary on the life and legacy of filmmaker Pattabhiram Reddy, a native of Nellore, Andhra Pradesh. In 1970, he produced and directed the Kannada classic SAMSKARA, a landmark film based on the novel of the same name by Jnanpith Award–winning writer U. R. Ananthamurthy. SAMSKARA won the President’s Gold Medal for Best Film and received several international film festival awards, creating history in Kannada cinema. This documentary traces Pattabhiram Reddy’s journey and ex

films.title: PETER HUJAR'S DAY
films.synopsis: On December 19, 1974, writer Linda Rosenkrantz sits with her friend, photographer Peter Hujar, in a quiet New York apartment and asks him to recount the previous day in precise detail. What unfolds is a candid, fragmented portrait of an artist - witty, erotically frank, and deeply vulnerable. Around their stillness echoes 1970s New York: a portrait session with Allen Ginsberg, a call with Susan Sontag, fleeting encounters and gestures. Drawn from transcripts rediscovered in 2019, Ira Sachs shape

films.title: THE EPIC POET
films.synopsis: MAHAKAVI is a Historical Film based on Poets concepts of Pampa who express in his work. Pampa is the first epic poet of the Kannada Language. An important scripture regarding him has been discovered in Andhra Pradesh. He lived in the 10th century, when he composed two epic poems called Aadi Purana and Vikramaarjuna Vijaya. Of these Vikramaarjuna Vijaya has become popular as Pampas Bharata. In this epic he has told the story of Mahabharata in different. Aadi Purana encapsulates the famous history

films.title: THE GREAT ARCH
films.language: Kannada | kannada | French | English | Italian | French
films.synopsis: 1982. French President François Mitterrand decides to launch an international architectural competition for the flagship project of his mandate: The Great Arch of La Défense, aligned with the Louvre and the Arc de Triomphe. Against all odds, Otto von Spreckelsen, a Danish architect, wins the competition. Overnight, this 53-year-old man, unknown in France, arrives in Paris where he is propelled at the helm of this pharaonic project. While the architect intends to build the Great Arch exactly as h

films.title: CAIRO STATION
films.synopsis: Qinawi, a physically challenged peddler who makes his living selling newspapers in the central Cairo train station, is obsessed with Hanuma, an attractive young woman who sells drinks. While she jokes with him about a possible relationship, she is actually in love with Abu Siri, a strong and respected porter at the station who is struggling to unionize his fellow workers to combat their boss’ exploitative and abusive treatment.

films.title: RUDAALI
films.synopsis: In a desert village in Rajasthan, Shanichari is a woman cursed by a lifetime of misfortune who is unable to shed a single tear. When she is mentored by a veteran "Rudaali", a professional mourner hired to weep at funerals of the elite, she eventually confronts her suppressed grief and finds her voice through a tragic personal revelation.

films.title: ANMOL- LOVINGLY OURS
films.synopsis: The joy of a couple becoming parents is shaken when an unexpected truth about their newborn’s gender identity confronts them with fear, love, and their own deeply held beliefs about what “normal” means.

films.title: CALLE MÁLAGA
films.language: Kannada | kannada | German | Spanish | Arabic | Spanish
films.synopsis: Maria Angeles, a 79-year-old Spanish woman, lives alone in Tangier, Morocco, and enjoys her daily routine. However, her life is turned upside down when her daughter arrives from Madrid to sell the apartment in which she has always lived. Determined to stay, she does everything she can to get her home and her belongings back and, unexpectedly, rediscovers love and sensuality.

films.synopsis: GERMANY | FRANCE | PALESTINE | EGYPT | QATAR | SAUDI ARABIA | SUDAN

films.title: ELFRIEDE JELINEK: LANGUAGE UNLEASHED
films.synopsis: A portrait of Elfriede Jelinek, the provocative Austrian writer who became the country’s first Nobel Laureate in Literature in 2004. Drawing on archive footage, interviews, and voiceovers, the film unfolds from Jelinek’s own perspective, tracing her radical relationship with language. Rebel, feminist, communist, enfant terrible and uncompromising artist, Jelinek emerges as a figure who weaponised words to confront power, patriarchy, and national mythmaking. The film captures her brilliance and v

films.title: INVISIBLES
films.synopsis: An escort questions her life until a client with a disability makes her confront who she is and who she might become.

films.title: MOSQUITOES

films.title: THE IVY
films.synopsis: Azucena, a woman in her thirties, approaches Julio, a teenage boy living in a group home, for reasons he doesn’t understand. As they spend time together, an uneasy closeness grows, changing the shape of a bond neither expected to find.

films.title: THE NATURE OF INVISIBLE THINGS
films.synopsis: Gloria, a 10-year-old girl, is spending her vacation in the hospital with her mother, a hard working nurse. While exploring the facility, Gloria meets Sofia, a girl convinced that her great grandmother’s worsening health is a result of her hospital admission. Bonding over their shared desire to leave, the two girls find solace in each other’s company. As departure becomes inevitable, the girls and their mothers head to a countryside retreat to spend the final days of an unforgettable summer.

films.title: KY NAM INN
films.synopsis: Set in post war Vietnam in 1985, Khang moves to Saigon after securing a job translating The Little Prince. Protected by family connections, he lives comfortably under the new regime until he meets Ky Nam, a reserved older widow in his neighborhood. Their encounter quietly unsettles his sense of stability, drawing him into an unexpected emotional journey that challenges his assumptions about love, loss, and belonging.

films.title: ACCIDENT
films.synopsis: A drunk driving accident by Deepak, the privileged son of a powerful politician, kills homeless people sleeping on a footpath and sparks national outrage. His father uses his influence to suppress the investigation and control the media. Ravi, a journalist, refuses to let the truth be buried and begins his own pursuit of justice. films.title: KOORMAVATARA
films.synopsis: Anand Rao, a retiring government clerk in Karnataka, lives a quiet, unremarkable life until his striking resemblance to Mahatma Gandhi lands him a role in a television serial about the leader. As the show becomes popular, Rao enjoys sudden fame, money, and public admiration. But playing Gandhi forces him to confront the gap between merely imitating ideals and truly living them. The attention strains his family life and inner peace, pushing him to question authenticity, morality, and what it real

films.title: KRAURYA
films.synopsis: The story follows Rangajji, an elderly widow in a small village who finds joy in telling fantastical stories to local children. Her life is upended when her only son dies under mysterious circumstances, leaving her vulnerable and dependent. She moves in with distant relatives, but her presence is met with coldness and indifference rather than compassion.

films.title: RIDING THE STALLION OF DREAM
films.synopsis: Set in a rural village, Kanasembo Kudureyaneri follows Irya, a gravedigger whose life is guided by his deep faith in Siddhas, wandering mystics believed to ensure salvation if their arrival coincides with a death. Through a non linear narrative shaped by dreams, omens, and village rituals, Irya begins to question his beliefs when signs fail and contradictions surface. films.title: THAAYI SAHEBA
films.synopsis: The film is based on the story of a Brahmin family during the pre-independence and post-independence periods of India. The protagonist, Narmada Thayi, is the second wife of Appa Sahib, a freedom fighter. The childless couple decide to adopt the child of Venkobanna, a close relative.
